Whoa... where have you been all my life CliftonM?? ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif ":0.0:")  Thanks for the link to the data.

 [@Starwhip](%7B___base_url___%7D/index.php?/profile/83990-starwhip/) you stuff is awesome as always!!
Now that there has been an update to import mods, do you think you could do a modded craft? Please?

> 
> 
> On 8/2/2016 at 9:51 PM, LordOfMinecraft99 said:
> 
> 
> Now that there has been an update to import mods, do you think you could do a modded craft? Please?
> 

I would need to know what mods are installed first. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") And even then there's no guarantee that it'll work properly.

Here's a Laythe test. FINALLY got water working properly, and definitely some better atmosphere setup.

Spoiler

[http://imgur.com/uNhF6aV](http://imgur.com/uNhF6aV)

EDIT: I know the shore is a little funky. I need to poke the bump map a little. It's also not the same resolution as the color map, so some issues may arise there.
